page.title: 12A DAY IN MY LIFE - CONTINUED
page.content: watched a programme on the television and then i had my dinner. My sister Dawn came home and said she was going swimming so i asked my mum if she would take me. She said yes, so i got my swimming things ready and my mum drove me to the swimming baths. When we arrived she asked Dawn if she would bring me home and Dawn said yes. After swimming Dawn brought me home and i had some tea and got ready for bed. I watched television for a little while and then went to bed at nine o'clock. Tomorrow i will go to school at nine o'clock and begin writing up my account for the school Domesday Project.
